text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Wait to the next report. We could open up safely if Trump would show better leadership in this COVID-19 crisis situation.. Statistics do not lie. CVID-19 deaths and the positive results is going up.. Who cares about shopping and being able to work when it’s not safe..
